definitions.definition: to ask; to request; to require; to demand; to claim

parsedExamples.example: 要求退款  ―  yāoqiú tuìkuǎn  ―  to request a refund
強烈要求 / 强烈要求  ―  qiángliè yāoqiú  ―  to demand; to urge
要求某人做某事  ―  yāoqiú mǒurén zuò mǒushì  ―  to ask somebody to do something

parsedExamples.translation: Tā yāoqiú tāmen wèi tā pò ge lì. [Pinyin]
Tā de gōngzuò yāoqiú tā quánguó sìchù pǎo. [Pinyin]
Xiànzài yǒu hěn duō shīshēng dōu liánmíng xiěxìn yāoqiú qǔxiāo lǎoshī de jiàoshòu zīgé. [Pinyin]

examples: 要求退款  ―  yāoqiú tuìkuǎn  ―  to request a refund
強烈要求 / 强烈要求  ―  qiángliè yāoqiú  ―  to demand; to urge
要求某人做某事  ―  yāoqiú mǒurén zuò mǒushì  ―  to ask somebody to do something
